Delete: MoveTo					optional	Moves the user to a other OU, if the value 1
DisableMailbox			optional	Disables Mailbox in Exchange on premise, if the value 1
RemoveMailbox			optional	Removes Mailbox in Exchange on premise, if the value 1
RemovePermanentMailbox	optional	Removes Mailbox permanent in Exchange on premise, if the value 1
ForwardToMailbox		optional	Forwards messages to this Exchange on premise mailbox
